snippet: With growth in the American labor force slowing, in part because of demographic changes, the usual measures may not give an accurate picture of the economy's health.
abstract: With growth in the American labor force slowing, in part because of demographic changes, the usual measures may not give an accurate picture of the economy's health.

headline.main: When Looking at Job Numbers, Add In a Changing America
headline.print_headline: When Looking at Job Numbers, Add In a Changing America
